data.title: Generally Look Out For Reward Tokens
data.description: The metadata in the 'Reward token' sent to your wallet will take you to a website that instead of sending the promised tokens, will send all the tokens in your wallet to the creator of the fake website. See 'SPAM Blacklists' above and Tip #3 below.

data.title: Fake Cornucopias (COPI) Reward Token
data.description: The metadata in the 'COPI Reward token' sent to your wallet will take you to a website that instead of sending the promised tokens, will send all the tokens in your wallet to the creator of the fake website.

data.title: Fake SNEK Reward Token
data.description: The metadata in the 'SNEK Reward token' sent to your wallet will take you to a website that instead of sending the promised tokens, will send all the tokens in your wallet to the creator of the fake website.

data.title: Fake Genius Yield Reward Token
data.description: Look out for a fake Genius Yield reward website airdropping a 'Genius Yield Reward token'. It will instead send all the tokens in your wallet to the creator of the fake website.

data.title: Fake AGIX REWARD EVENT Giveaway
data.description: Look out for a fake AGIX REWARD EVENT giveaway website that will trick you into sending select assets to the creator of the fake website.

data.title: Fake Charles Hoskinson Video
data.description: GenerativeAI created fake Charles Hoskinson video promoting an airdrop.

data.title: Fake SNEK Giveaway
data.description: Look out for a fake SNEK giveaway website that will trick you into sending select assets to the creator of the fake website.

data.title: Berry Pool Wallet Drain
data.description: Look out for a Berry Pool fake website that will trick you into sending all your assets to the creator of the fake website.
